name: servicedeskagent
description: LiveKit AI Service Desk Agent with Azure OpenAI

scripts.dev-simple: concurrently "npm run token-server" "npm run agent" "npm run frontend"
scripts.install-deps: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.fix-frontend: cd frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & del package-lock.json 2>nul & npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & del package-lock.json 2>nul
